text: Hi there, we at <http://modev.com|modev.com> are looking for a freelance lead HubSpot developer to work on projects with our partnered projects with Google and Amazon. We're looking for someone that can own all aspects of design, development, testing, and workflows in HubSpot adhering to best practices. The right person will be able to work in a VERY fast paced environment producing super high quality work for some of the world's largest tech brands. Please DM me with a portfolio and hourly salary expectations if you are interested!
